channel.title: Item's won't recolor? 317 DELTA REP++

item.title: Item's won't recolor? 317 DELTA REP++
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[center]317 DELTA
(Not pi!!!)

I have the new rs model whip:

I want to recolor a whip and make…lets say a “purple whip”

This is the purple whip int:

case 19932: class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 49863; class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Purple Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Whip Recolored".getBytes(); break;

I add it to my class8.java client side and compile it.

When I add it to a shop this whip still comes up.

How do I make the recoloring work?
Rep++ for help![/center]
